name: Super Pixel Defense
description:
This project is functional but is still in development.

Features, mechanics, balance, and art assets are still being added, modified, or removed. You can expect some bugs and issues during play, and account progress will be reset with future updates. 

Please check the latest development logs for more details.

The data stream has been hacked, the incoming images are corrupted!
Build your pixel processor and restore the art to its original form.

Super Pixel Defense is a tower defense game with strategy and puzzle elements.  Gameplay and mechanics are inspired by a variety of games and lets you experiment with different play styles and strategies. 

Try your best to correct the corrupted images as you progress through the core game unlocking more challenging and complex levels.

Build custom levels using the in-game editor. Select an image and set level goals from easy to impossible. Level files can be accessed and shared.

Customize level settings and experiment with the buildings in this sandbox art creation mode. Import your own images for reprocessing and use the in-game screenshot feature to save your creations.

This mode is also a fun way to make some art and get familiar with the game's mechanics. Check out the Abstract Pixel Art Pack for some examples of sandbox creations. 

Includes pixel art assets by:

Caz: https://cazwolf.itch.io

ghostpixxells: https://ghostpixxells.itch.io

ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io

Soundtrack is a selection of music by Nihilore: http://www.nihilore.com

Technical Details

1920 x 1080 or greater resolution required for current build.

Mouse & Keyboard controls.
